Tim explained: I live in… [+2041 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Murray
articles.title: Student nurses on Covid placements in UK call for return of paid NHS contracts - The Guardian
articles.description: Scheme for final-year students ended in September, but many are being drafted in for second wave
